## ScreenPosition interface

A position in the screen, that extends [SimplePosition](./vm-providers.simpleposition.md) with the size of the screen in pixels, because it is needed by some providers (i.e. qemu) to compute the mouse position to send to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScreenPosition extends SimplePosition 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [SimplePosition](./vm-providers.simpleposition.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [screenHeight](./vm-providers.screenposition.screenheight.md) | number | Height of the screen in pixels. |
|  [screenWidth](./vm-providers.screenposition.screenwidth.md) | number | Width of the screen in pixels. |
